short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial Chrome extension for Tilaa, a VPS provider in the Netherlands.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simplified version of the Tilaa dashboard in the form of a Chrome extension. It allows you to retrieve a list of your virtual servers, with their current status and configuration, and perform basic management tasks such as (re)starting and stopping a machine.
